text: @eid_94fb5d84 created this channel on 2026-02-28 00:00:00. This is the very beginning of the planning-TableauInsightsGenerator channel.

@eid_0e2e8d07, @eid_294dc39d joined planning-TableauInsightsGenerator.
Hi team, I want to discuss about the Product Vision Document for TableauInsightsGenerator. Let's brainstorm some ideas! ğŸ˜Š

@here Check out the Scikit-learn library on GitHub, which provides simple and efficient tools for data mining and data analysis, and is often used in building predictive models. https://github.com/scikit-learn/scikit-learn
Great initiative, @eid_0e2e8d07! I think we should start by clearly defining the problem we're solving. Why do users need automatic insights?
Agreed, @eid_294dc39d! From my research, users often feel overwhelmed by data and need quick, actionable insights. We should emphasize that in the document.

@here Read this article on how Tableau's new features are leveraging AI to provide deeper insights and more intuitive data exploration. https://www.forbes.com/sites/forbestechcouncil/2023/10/01/how-tableau-is-using-ai-to-enhance-data-insights/
Hey all, from an engineering perspective, we should also highlight the tech stack and how it supports real-time data processing. Thoughts, @eid_d3a4fc8f?
Absolutely, @eid_16935c12. We can mention our use of machine learning algorithms to generate insights. Let's ensure we cover scalability too.
Great points! Let's break it down into sections: Problem Statement, Solution Overview, Key Features, Tech Stack, and User Benefits. Any other sections we should add?
Maybe a section on competitive analysis? It could help us position TableauInsightsGenerator in the market.
Good call, Julia. We should also include a section on future roadmap to show long-term vision.
ğŸ‘ I'll start drafting the Tech Stack section. Can we aim to have a draft ready by next Friday?
Sounds good, @eid_16935c12. I'll take the Problem Statement and Solution Overview. @eid_53a6add1, can you handle the User Benefits and Competitive Analysis?
Sure thing, @eid_0e2e8d07! I'll have something ready by Wednesday. @eid_d3a4fc8f, can you assist with the Key Features section?
On it, Julia! Let's sync up on Tuesday to discuss details. ğŸ˜Š
Perfect! Thanks, everyone. Let's keep the momentum going and check in mid-week. ğŸš€
